data.name: When are the taxes due?
data.value: 什么税到期？

data.name:
SECURED PROPERTY TAXES

Annual property tax bills are mailed in early October of each year. The bill is payable in two installments.

The 1st installment is due on November 1 and is delinquent if the payment is not received by 5:00 p.m. or postmarked by December 10. A 10% penalty is assessed for delinquent payments.

The 2nd installment is due on February 1 and is delinquent if the payment is not received by 5:00 p.m. or postmarked by April 10, a 10% penalty and $10.00 cost are assessed.

If December 10 or April 10 falls on a Saturday, Sunday, or a legal holiday, the delinquency date is the next business day.

Both installments can be paid at the same time. If you choose to pay both installments in one payment, please include the first and second installment stubs with your payment.

Payment Deadline Summary

Installment

1st

2nd

Due Date

November 1

February 1

Delinquency Date*

December 10

April 10

Penalty, if delinquent

10% of amount due

10% of amount due + $10.00 Cost

*If December 10th or April 10th falls on a Saturday, Sunday, or a Los Angeles County holiday, the delinquency date is moved to the next business day. To assist taxpayers in understanding how to avoid penalties that could result from postmark issues, the Tax Collector has compiled important related information on how to Avoid Penalties By Understanding Postmarks

UNSECURED PROPERTY TAXES

Unsecured tax bills are delinquent if the payment is not received by 5:00 p.m. or postmarked by August 31 of the tax year. If August 31 falls on a Saturday, Sunday or a legal holiday, the deadline is the next business day.
data.value:
安全财产税     

每年10月初邮寄年度财产税单。该法案分两期支付。     

第一期付款将于11月1日到期，如果在下午5点之前未收到付款，则拖欠会费。或者在12月10日之前邮戳。对逾期付款评估10％的罚款。     

第二期将于2月1日到期，如果在下午5点之前未收到付款，则拖欠。或者在4月10日之前邮戳，评估10％的罚款和10.00美元的费用。     

如果12月10日或4月10日是星期六，星期日或法定假日，则拖欠日期为下一个工作日。     

两个分期付款可以同时支付。如果您选择在一次付款中支付两个分期付款，请在付款时附上第一期和第二期分期付款。     

付款截止日期摘要     

        
            
                

分期付款                 

第一                 

第二                          

                

截止日期                 

11月1日                 

2月1日                          

                

Delinquency Date *                 

12月10日                 

4月10日                          

                

Penalty，if undeinquent                 

到期金额的10％                 

到期金额的10％+ 10.00美元的费用                                

        *如果12月10日或4月10日属于周六，周日或洛杉矶县假日，则将拖欠日期移至下一个工作日。协助纳税人理解         如何避免邮戳问题可能造成的处罚，税务员已编制了有关如何处理的重要相关信息         通过了解邮戳避免处罚          

未经处理的物业税     

如果在下午5点之前未收到付款，则无抵押税单会拖欠。或在纳税年度的8月31日之前寄出。如果8月31日是周六，周日或法定假日，则截止日期为下一个工作日。

data.name: How can I get a copy of my current tax bill?
data.value: 我怎样才能获得当前税单的副本？

data.name:
Secured

To obtain a copy of a secured property tax bill, please visit https://ttc.lacounty.gov/request-duplicate-bill/

Current Year Secured Taxes Online: The Treasurer and Tax Collector's website provides current year tax information. Click the following link: How much are my secured property taxes? and enter your Assessor's Identification Number to view the amount of secured taxes due for the current year. This website provides current year tax information and is available between October 1 and June 30 only.

Unsecured

If you would like a substitute tax bill, please call the Unsecured Property Tax Section at (213)893-7935. Please provide the year and bill number, if available; however, if you do not have that information please provide your name, the type of bill you receive (e.g., boat, business property), the property address, and the billing address. When making a payment, be sure to always write the year and bill number on your check. BE CAREFUL, BILL NUMBERS CHANGE EVERY YEAR. For more information on how you may obtain a copy of an Unsecured Property Tax Bill from the Treasurer and Tax Collector, please visit https://ttc.lacounty.gov/request-duplicate-bill-unsecured/

Current Year Unsecured Taxes Online: The Treasurer and Tax Collector's website provides current year unsecured tax amounts. Click the following link: How much are my Unsecured taxes? and enter the year and bill number to view the amount of unsecured taxes due for the current year. This website provides current year unsecured tax information and is available between March 1 and June 30 only.
data.value:
安全

要获取安全财产税单的副本，请访问 https://ttc.lacounty.gov/request-duplicate-bill/

当前年度在线担保税收：财务主管和税务员的网站提供当年税务信息。点击以下链接：我的安全财产税是多少？并输入您的评估员识别号码以查看本年到期的已抵税税额。本网站提供当年税务信息，仅在10月1日至6月30日期间提供。

不安全
如果您想要替代税单，请致电无担保财产税部，电话：（213）893-7935。如果有的话，请提供年份和账单号码;但是，如果您没有该信息，请提供您的姓名，您收到的账单类型（例如船，商业财产），财产地址和账单地址。付款时，请务必在支票上写上年份和帐单号码。每年都要小心，每个月都会有变化。有关如何从财务主管和税务员那里获得无抵押财产税单的副本的更多信息，请访问 https://ttc.lacounty.gov/request-duplicate-bill-unsecured/
当年无担保在线税收：财务主管和税务员的网站提供当年无担保税额。点击以下链接：我的无抵押税金额是多少？并输入年度和账单编号，用于查看当年应付的无抵押税款金额。本网站提供当年无担保税务信息，仅在3月1日至6月30日期间提供。

data.name: What is a supplemental tax bill?
data.value: 什么是补充税单？

data.name:
In addition to annual taxes, you may be responsible for paying supplemental property taxes. State law requires the Assessor to reappraise property upon a change in ownership or new construction. The supplemental assessment reflects the difference between the new assessed value and the old or prior assessed value. If the property is reassessed at a higher value than the old assessed value, a supplemental bill will be issued. If the property is reassessed at a lower value than the old assessed value, a refund will be issued.

The taxes are prorated based on the number of months left in the fiscal year from the date of ownership change or the new construction completion date. If the change in ownership or new construction occurs between January 1st and May 31st, two supplemental tax bills will be issued. The first supplemental bill will be for the remainder of the fiscal year, and the second supplemental bill will be for the fiscal year that follows.

Supplemental tax bills are mailed directly to the property owner and are your responsibility. In general, they are not paid out of your impound account. Please check with your lender.
data.value:
除了年度税，您可能还要负责支付补充财产税。州法律要求评估员在所有权或新建筑改变时重新评估财产。补充评估反映了新评估值与旧评估值或之前评估值之间的差异。如果以比旧评估值更高的价值重新评估财产，则将发布补充法案。如果以低于旧评估值的价值重新评估财产，则将发放退款。

根据所有权变更之日的财政年度剩余的月数按比例分配税收或新建工程竣工日期。如果在1月1日至5月31日期间发生所有权或新建工程的变更，将发放两份补充税单。第一个补充法案将在本财政年度的剩余时间内完成，第二个补充法案将在随后的会计年度中使用。

补充税账单直接邮寄给业主，是您的责任。一般来说，他们不会从您的扣押帐户中支付。请咨询您的贷方。

data.name: How do I locate my Assessor's identification number (AIN)?
data.value: 如何找到我的评估员身份证号码（AIN）？

data.name:
The Assessor Identification Number or AIN is the main indexing system used for property tax purposes. Each property has a unique AIN. You can locate your AIN various ways:

  • The AIN can be found on your deed, which was used to acquire ownership.
  • The AIN can be found on your title report (which you received when you acquired title insurance).
  • The AIN can be found on your "Annual Property Tax Bill or Supplemental Property Tax Bill. Request Duplicate Bill
  • The AIN can be found by going to the Property Maps and Data link or the Property Sales and Maps quick link from the homepage of the Assessor's website and entering your property address.
  • The AIN can be found by contacting the Assessor at (213) 974-2111, toll free at 888 807-2111, or any of the Assessor's Office Locations.
data.value:
评估员识别号码或AIN是用于财产税目的的主要索引系统。每间酒店都拥有独特的AIN。您可以通过各种方式找到您的AIN：

    
            
  • AIN可以在您的契约中找到，该契约用于获得所有权。         
  • AIN可以在您的产权报告中找到（您在获得产权保险时收到）。         
  • AIN可在您的“年度物业税条例草案或补充物业税条例草案”中找到。要求重复的账单         
  • 可以通过转到Assessor网站主页上的Property Maps and Data链接或Property Sales and Maps快速链接找到AIN并输入您的酒店地址。         
  • 可以通过联系评估员（213）974-2111，免费电话888 807-2111或任何评估员办公地点。

data.name: Why did I receive an unsecured tax bill?
data.value: 为什么我收到无担保税单？

data.name: Some property taxes are called "Unsecured" because the taxes are not secured by real property (such as land). Unsecured property tax is based on the value of the property. The person or entity assessed for the tax is liable for the payment of the taxes. Unsecured taxes are also referred to as personal property taxes. Types of properties that are assessed unsecured taxes include watercraft (such as boats or jet skis), airplanes, business personal property, business fixtures, and leased equipment.
data.value: 一些财产税被称为“无担保”，因为税收不是由不动产（如土地）担保。无抵押物业税根据物业的价值计算。评估税收的个人或实体负责支付税款。无抵押税也称为个人财产税。评估无担保税的房产类型包括船只（如船或喷气式滑雪板），飞机，商业个人财产，商业设施和租赁设备。

data.name: Why did I get an informational tax bill only?
data.value: 为什么我只收到信息税单呢？

data.name:
If your monthly mortgage payments include your property taxes, you have an impound account. Each July, lending institutions such as mortgage companies, banks and savings and loans provide the Treasurer and Tax Collector with a listing of properties with impound accounts. This information is used to forward annual tax bills to the lending institutions. An Information Only tax bill is also sent to the property owner. The lending institutions are then responsible for paying the taxes for their customers.

Because an agreement to pay property taxes through an impound account is between you and your lender, you must contact your lender for the following:

  • You have questions regarding the original annual property tax bill.
  • An overpayment has occurred because of the impound account.
  • You no longer wish to continue with an impound account.
  • You receive an adjusted or supplemental tax bill.
Generally, supplemental taxes are not covered by impound accounts and you are directly responsible for making payments.

The Treasurer and Tax Collector does not have the authority to remove impound account payments from the system upon your request. Your lender must authorize this removal. Please contact your lender if you have questions regarding the status of your impound account. Lending institutions are responsible for notifying property owners of any changes in impound account status and when an overpayment has occurred.

If you no longer have an impound account, you may use the stub of your annual Information Only tax bill to pay your taxes.
data.value:
如果您的每月抵押贷款包括您的财产税，那么您有一个扣押帐户。每年7月，抵押贷款公司，银行以及储蓄和贷款等贷款机构都会向财务主管和税务员提供一系列有扣押账户的财产。该信息用于将年度税单转发给贷款机构。仅信息税单也会发送给业主。贷款机构负责为其客户支付税款。

因为您和贷方之间通过扣押账户支付财产税的协议，您必须联系您的贷方以获取以下信息： br />
  • 您对原来的年度财产税法案有疑问。
  • 由于账户扣押而发生多付款。
  • 你没有
  • 您收到调整或补充的税款。 一般来说，补充税不包括在扣押账户中，您直接负责制作税款。付款。

    财务主管和税务人员无权根据您的要求从系统中删除扣留的账户款项。您的贷方必须授权此删除。如果您对扣押帐户的状态有疑问，请与您的贷方联系。贷款机构负责通知业主有关扣押账户状态的任何变化以及何时发生多付款。

    如果您不再拥有扣押账户，您可以使用您年度信息的存根纳税的税单。

data.name: Why did I receive a tax bill when I sold the property?
data.value: 我出售房产时为什么收到税单？

data.name:
A previous owner may receive a secured or unsecured tax bill for several reasons. If you no longer own the property and receive an annual property tax bill, you may do either of the following:
  1. Forward the bill to the new owner; or
  2. Write or mark sold and the new owner's name on the envelope and return it to the Los Angeles County Tax Collector.
If you receive a supplemental tax bill and you have recently sold the property, the date of the bill will determine what needs to be done.

If the date of the bill is prior to the date of the sale, the bill should have been paid at the close of the escrow. Please contact your escrow company to make sure this bill was paid.

If the date of the bill is after the date of the sale, please contact the Auditor-Controller's Office to determine if the bill needs to be prorated between the seller and the buyer.

Some unsecured tax bills are assessments for events (new construction or changes in ownership) that occurred prior to the sale of the property. They are billed after the closure of escrow. The seller may be responsible for a prorated portion of the taxes. Unsecured personal property tax bills for a business, a boat or an airplane are the full responsibility of the assessee of record as of the January 1 lien date.
data.value:
由于多种原因，前任所有者可能会收到有担保或无担保的税单。如果您不再拥有该房产并收到年度房产税账单，您可以执行以下任一操作：
  1. 将账单转发给新的所有者;或者
  2. 在信封上写下或标记已售出的商标和新的所有者姓名，并将其返还给洛杉矶县税务员。 如果您收到补充税单并且最近有出售物业，账单的日期将决定需要做什么。

    如果账单的日期是先前到销售日期，该账单应该在托管结束时支付。请联系您的托管公司以确保该账单已支付。

    如果账单日期为在销售日期之后，请联系审计员 - 财务主管办公室，以确定是否需要在卖方和买方之间按比例分配账单。

    一些无抵押税单是在出售物业之前发生的事件（新建或所有权变更）的评估。他们在托管结束后收费。卖方可能负责按比例分摊税款。企业，船只或飞机的无担保个人财产税单由1月1日留置日期的记录评估员承担全部责任。

data.name: What causes a supplemental bill?
data.value: 什么导致补充账单？

data.name:
Supplemental bills are generated due to qualifying changes in ownership or new construction. Well known types of changes in ownership are those changes involving a buyer and seller. However, change in ownership situations also include removing or adding someone s name from title even when monetary consideration is not exchanged. Typical new construction events include adding square footage or a swimming pool. However, new construction also includes, but is not limited to, adding baths, fireplaces and air conditioning when they did not previously exist.

The Assessor generally discovers these events two ways: 1) Changes in ownership are discovered through publicly recorded deeds; 2) New construction is discovered when copies of building permits are sent to the Assessor's Office. These bills are in addition to the regular annual tax bills. Please see Supplemental Assessments.
data.value: 由于所有权或新建筑的合格变更而产生补充票据。众所周知的所有权变更类型是涉及买方和卖方的变更。但是，所有权情况的变化还包括即使在未交换货币对价时也从标题中删除或添加某人的姓名。典型的新建筑活动包括增加面积或游泳池。然而，新建筑还包括但不限于在以前不存在的情况下增加浴缸，壁炉和空调。评估员通常会以两种方式发现这些事件：1）所有权变更是通过公开记录的行为发现; 2）当建筑许可证的副本发送给评估办公室时，会发现新建筑。这些账单另外到常规年度税单。请参阅补充评估。

data.name: How much do I owe?
data.value: 我得付多少钱？

data.name:
To locate the amount of your Secured Property Taxes, click the following link How much are my property taxes? and enter your Assessor's Identification Number. This website provides current year and delinquent secured tax information.

We accept partial payments. If you are not able to pay the full amount due, pay what you can on or before the delinquency date as this will reduce the balance of outstanding taxes owed.
data.value:
要找到安全财产税的金额，请点击以下链接我的财产税是多少？并输入您的财产管理员的身份证号码。本网站提供当年和拖欠担保税务信息。

我们接受部分付款。如果您无法支付全额到期金额，请在拖欠日期或之前支付您的费用，因为这将减少所欠未偿还税款的余额。

data.name: How to avoid penalties by understanding postmarks?
data.value: 如何通过了解邮戳来避免处罚？

data.name: Information about Avoiding Penalties is available at: https://ttc.lacounty.gov/avoid-penalties-by-understanding-postmarks
data.value: 有关避免处罚的信息，请访问： https://ttc.lacounty.gov/避免-处罚，由认识首日封

data.name: Can I make partial payments?
data.value: 我可以部分付款吗？

data.name: We accept partial payments. If you are not able to pay the full amount due, pay what you can on or before the delinquency date as this will reduce the balance of outstanding taxes owed.
data.value: 我们接受部分付款。如果您无法支付全额到期金额，请在拖欠日期或之前支付您的费用，因为这将减少所欠未偿还税款的余额。

data.name: How do I request a Penalty Cancellation?
data.value: 我如何申请罚款取消？

data.name: Information about Canceling Penalties is available at: https://ttc.lacounty.gov/penalty-cancellation-request-2/

data.name: What can I do if the Tax Collector never received my payments?
data.value: 如果税务员从未收到我的付款，我该怎么办？

data.name: Information about Lost Payment is available at: https://ttc.lacounty.gov/penalty-cancellation-due-to-a-lost-payment-affidavit/
data.value: 有关遗失支付的信息，请访问： https：// ttc.lacounty.gov/penalty-cancellation-due-to-a-lost-payment-affidavit/

data.name: Can I view my secured property tax payment history online?
data.value: 我可以在线查看我的安全财产纳税历史吗？

data.name:
Taxpayers, using their Personal Identification Number or PIN, can access the past three years of their Secured Property Taxes Payment History.

Taxpayers will need their Assessor's Identification Number (AIN) and as stated above, their PIN to access their payment history. Taxpayers can locate the PIN on any original tax bill. They will also need to enter the CAPTCHA information (security words) for validation.
data.value:
纳税人使用他们的个人识别码或密码可以访问过去三年的担保物业税收付款记录。

纳税人将需要他们的评估员身份证号码（AIN），如上所述，他们的PIN码可以访问他们的付款历史记录。纳税人可以在任何原始税单上找到PIN。他们还需要输入CAPTCHA信息（安全词）进行验证。

data.name: How can I find out the amount of my tax bill?
data.value: 我怎样才能知道我的税单金额？

data.name:
Secured Bills

This information is available from any of the following sources:

Secured Taxes Online: The Treasurer and Tax Collector's website provides secured tax information. Click the following link How much are my property taxes (secured)? and enter your Assessor's Identification Number to view the amount of secured taxes due. Current year tax information is available between October 1 and June 30 only, delinquent information is available all year, except during July.

Substitute Tax Bills: To obtain a copy of a secured property tax bill, please visit https://ttc.lacounty.gov/request-duplicate-bill/

Current Year Unsecured Taxes Online: The Treasurer and Tax Collector's website provides current year unsecured tax amounts. Click the following link: How much are my taxes (unsecured)? and enter the year and bill number to view the amount of the current year unsecured taxes. This website provides current year unsecured tax information and is available between March 1 and June 30 only. You may also phone the department at(213) 893-7935.

Substitute Unsecured Tax Bills: If you want a substitute tax bill, please call the Unsecured Property Tax Section at (213) 893-7935. Please provide the year and bill number, if available; however, if you do not have that information please provide your name, the type of bill you receive (e.g., boat, business property), the property address, and the billing address. When making a payment make sure to always write the year and bill number on your check. BE CAREFUL, BILL NUMBERS CHANGE EVERY YEAR. For more information on how you may obtain a copy of an Unsecured Property Tax Bill from the Treasurer and Tax Collector, please visit https://ttc.lacounty.gov/request-duplicate-bill-unsecured/
data.value:
安全帐单

此信息可从以下任何来源获得：

安全税在线：财务主管和税务员的网站提供有担保的税务信息。点击以下链接我的财产税（担保）多少？并输入您的评估员识别号码进行查看应缴纳的担保税额。本年度的税务信息仅在10月1日至6月30日期间提供，除7月份外，全年都有欠款信息。

替代税单：要获取担保财产税单的副本，请访问 https：// ttc。 lacounty.gov/request-duplicate-bill/

无担保票据

当前年度无抵押税在线：财务主管和税务员的网站提供当年无担保税额。点击以下链接：我的税金（无担保）是多少？并输入年份和账单号码以查看当年无担保税款的金额。网站提供当年无担保税务信息，仅在3月1日至6月30日期间提供您也可以拨打(213)893-7935给部门打电话。

替换无担保税单：如果您想要替代税单，请致电无保证财产税部，电话：（213）893-7935。如果有的话，请提供年份和账单号码;但是，如果您没有该信息，请提供您的姓名，您收到的账单类型（例如船，商业财产），财产地址和账单地址。付款时，请务必在支票上写上年份和账单号码。 每年都要小心，每月更改一次。有关如何从财务主管和税务员那里获得无抵押财产税条例草案的更多信息，请访问 https://ttc.lacounty.gov/request-duplicate-bill-unsecured/

data.name: Why do I have a tax lien on my property?
data.value: 为什么我的财产上有税收留置权？

data.name:
If you do not pay your unsecured tax bill by the due date, a penalty of 10% will be charged on the date of the delinquency. Additional penalties and costs will be charged beginning with the first day of the second month after the delinquency date. These penalties include 1.5% of the base tax each month and a $20.00 collection cost. Beginning with the first day of the third month after the delinquency date, an additional $29.00 will be charged.

In addition to the penalties, a tax lien will be recorded against you. The lien will be attached to every piece of property you own that is located in Los Angeles County. This lien also affects your credit score. Tax Liens are released when a bill is paid in full or whenever the bill is canceled by the Auditor/Controller.
data.value:
如果您未在截止日期前支付无担保税单，则在违约日期将收取10％的罚款。从拖欠日期后的第二个月的第一天开始，将收取额外的罚款和费用。这些处罚包括每月1.5％的基本税和20.00美元的征收费用。从拖欠日期后的第三个月的第一天开始，将收取额外的29.00美元。

除了处罚之外，还将记录对您的税务留置权。留置权将附在您所拥有的位于洛杉矶县的每一处房产上。此留置权也会影响您的信用评分。当账单全额支付或者审计员/财务主管取消账单时，将解除税务留置权。

data.name: What should I do if I'm expecting a refund?
data.value: 如果我期待退款，该怎么办？

data.name:
Several actions by the Auditor-Controller, Assessor, Assessment Appeals Board and Treasurer and Tax Collector's Office may result in refunds.

  • Approved Exemptions or Assessed Value Changes: If the Assessor's Office grants an exemption or decreases the assessed values of a property, a refund may be issued. For more information about this type of refund, contact the Assessor's office by email at helpdesk@assessor.lacounty.gov or the Auditor-Controller's Office at propertytax@auditor.lacounty.gov. You may also contact any of the Assessor's office locations.

  • Assessment Appeals Decisions: If the decision of an Assessment Appeal Board reduces your assessed value or reverses a reassessment of your property, a refund may result. For more information about this type of refund, contact the Assessor's Office by email at helpdesk@assessor.lacounty.gov or the Auditor-Controller's Office at propertytax@auditor.lacounty.gov. You may also contact any of the Assessor's office locations. If your assessment appeal for a reduced value is denied, call the Assessment Appeals Board at (213) 974-1471.

  • Excess Payments: If you pay the same bill twice or overpay taxes, a refund may result. These refunds are processed and issued by the Treasurer and Tax Collector's Office. For more information about this type of refund, contact the Treasurer and Tax Collector's Office by email at info@ttc.lacounty.gov.

  • Reductions or Deletions of Direct Assessments: A refund may result from the reduction or deletion of a direct assessment. However, the Auditor-Controller does not process refunds resulting from reductions or deletions of direct assessments after the taxes have been paid. If you are entitled to a direct assessment refund, you must contact the taxing agency responsible for the assessment. The telephone numbers of the direct assessment taxing agencies are printed on your annual tax bill. For additional information, contact the Auditor-Controller's office by email at propertytax@auditor.lacounty.gov.
data.value:
审计员 - 财务主任，评估员，评估上诉委员会，财务主任和税务员办公室的几项行动可能会导致退款。

  • 批准的豁免或评估价值变更：如果评估办公室授予豁免或降低房产的评估价值，则可以退款。有关此类退款的更多信息，请发送电子邮件至 helpdesk@assessor.lacounty.gov 或审核员控制器办公室联系评估办公室。 propertytax@auditor.lacounty.gov 。您也可以联系任何评估员的办公地点。

    < li> 评估上诉决定：如果评估上诉委员会的决定降低您的评估价值或撤销对您的财产的重新评估，可能会导致退款。有关此类退款的更多信息，请发送电子邮件至 helpdesk@assessor.lacounty.gov 或审核员控制器办公室联系评估办公室。 propertytax@auditor.lacounty.gov 。您也可以联系任何评估员的办公地点。如果您的减值评估申请被拒绝，请致电评估申诉委员会，电话：（213）974-1471。

  • 超额付款< / span>：如果您支付相同的账单两次或多付税款，可能会退款。这些退款由财务主管和税务员办公室处理和发放。有关此类退款的更多信息，请发送电子邮件至 info@ttc.lacounty.gov 联系财务主管和税务员办公室。

  • 直接评估的减少或删除：退款可能是因为减少或删除直接评估。但是，审计员 - 财务主任不会处理在缴纳税款后减少或删除直接评估所导致的退款。如果您有权获得直接评估退款，则必须联系负责评估的税务机构。直接评估税务机构的电话号码印在您的年度税单上。有关其他信息，请通过电子邮件联系Auditor-Controller办公室： propertytax@auditor.lacounty.gov 。

data.name: Can I get information on Tax Sales?
data.value: 我可以获得有关税收销售的信息吗？

data.name:
Los Angeles County does not sell Certificates of Tax Liens nor does any other County in California at this time. Auctions of Tax Defaulted property are generally held twice a year. Anyone who can legally own property can bid on a property. Registration is required with a deposit that will be applied to a purchase or refunded if not used to purchase a property. Terms are cash or cashiers checks only payable at the auction immediately upon being awarded the sale by the auctioneer. If the sale is over $5,000, a 10% or $5,000 deposit must be paid at the time of the sale and the balance must be paid within 30 days. The deposit is forfeited if the sale is not completed timely. For more information on Los Angeles County tax sales, please visit the Treasurer and Tax Collector’s website: https://ttc.lacounty.gov/auction-frequently-asked-questions.

If you would like additional information regarding this subject, you may submit your question to our public service staff by using our Public Inquiry Form.
data.value:
洛杉矶县目前不出售税收留置权证书，也不出售加利福尼亚州的任何其他县。对违反财产的财产的拍卖通常每年举行两次。任何合法拥有房产的人都可以竞标房产。需要注册，押金将用于购买或退还（如果不用于购买房产）。条款是现金或收银员支票，只有在拍卖人获得拍卖后立即在拍卖中支付。如果销售额超过5,000美元，则必须在销售时支付10％或5,000美元的押金，余额必须在30天内支付。如果销售未及时完成，押金将被没收。有关洛杉矶县税收销售的更多信息，请访问财务主管和税务员的网站： https ：//ttc.lacounty.gov/auction-frequently-asked-questions 。

如果您想了解有关此主题的更多信息，您可以使用我们的问题向公共服务人员提交您的问题。 公开查询表。

data.name: How do I get a tax lien removed from my property?
data.value: 如何从我的财产中删除税务留置权？

data.name:
We cannot remove the lien unless it was recorded in error. However, after you pay the taxes, penalties, and cost, we will send you a Release of Lien with instructions on how to record the document to prove that the delinquency has been paid in full. Please call (213) 893-7935 for more information. We are located at:

KENNETH HAHN HALL OF ADMINISTRATION
225 NORTH HILL STREET, ROOM 122
LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90012
data.value:
除非记录错误，否则我们无法删除留置权。但是，在您支付税款，罚款和费用后，我们会向您发送一份留置权文件，说明如何记录文件以证明已经全额支付了拖欠款。请致电(213)893-7935获取更多信息。我们位于：

KENNETH HAHN行政办公室中心地址：苏黎世洛杉矶市西北街225号225号加利福尼亚州90012

data.name: Is there an exclusion for transfers between parents and children? (Proposition 58)
data.value: 父母和孩子之间的转移是否被排除在外？ （命题58）

data.name:
Proposition 58 (Parent and Child Transfers)

Proposition 58 is a constitutional initiative passed by California voters. It provides property tax relief by preventing the reassessment (change in base year value) of real property when it is transferred between parents and children. The transfer may be a gift, an inheritance or a title change such as adding or deleting a name. In order to receive this exclusion, either party must file a claim. In general, the claim must be filed within three years of the date of transfer (date of the recorded document or date of death), but before the property is transferred or sold to a third party.

For additional information, call the Assessor's Proposition Unit at (213) 893-1239. Claim forms are also available at all of the Assessor's office locations and online at the Assessor's forms webpage. Also, you may read more about Proposition 58 in the Assessor's brochure.
data.value:
命题58（父母和子女转移）

命题58是加州选民通过的宪法倡议。它通过防止房地产和子女之间转让房地产时的重新评估（基准年价值的变化）来提供财产税减免。转移可以是礼物，继承或标题更改，例如添加或删除名称。要获得此排除，任何一方都必须提出索赔。一般而言，索赔必须在转移之日起三年内（记录文件的日期或死亡日期），但在财产转让或出售给第三方之前提交。

更多信息，请致电（213）893-1239与评估员的命题单位联系。索赔表格也可以在评估员的办公地点上以及在评估员的表单网页。另外，您可以在评估员的小册子中阅读有关命题58的更多信息。

data.name: Why did my taxes go up more than 2 percent?
data.value: 为什么我的税收涨幅超过2％？

data.name:
Proposition 13 limits increases in assessed value to no more than 2 percent per year until the property has a change in ownership or any new construction is completed at which time the property must be reassessed. The assessed value is the full cash or market value at the time of the purchase plus the incremental market value of each subsequent new construction. This proposition was approved on June 6, 1978 and took effect as of July 1, 1978.

Although your assessed value may only increase no more than 2 percent per year, the amount of your taxes may increase by a higher percentage for a number of reasons. The tax rate in your area can change as new bonds are added or decrease as bonds are paid off. Direct assessments/special charges can also cause an increase or decrease as they are added or removed. These special charges are added to the tax bill by local districts and cities. A sewer assessment is a typical special charge that is added to the tax bill.
data.value:
第13号提案将评估价值的增加限制为每年不超过2％，直到财产所有权发生变更或任何新建筑完工为止，此时财产必须重新评估。评估价值是购买时的全部现金或市场价值加上每个后续新建筑的增量市场价值。该提议于1978年6月6日获得批准，并于1978年7月1日生效。

虽然您的评估价值每年仅增加不超过2％，但您的税额可能会增加由于多种原因，百分比较高。随着新债券的增加或减少，您所在地区的税率可能会随着债券的还清而发生变化。直接评估/特殊费用也可以在添加或删除时增加或减少。这些特殊费用被当地地区和城市添加到税单中。下水道评估是添加到税单中的典型特殊费用。

data.name: What should I do if I do not agree with the Assessor's value of my property?
data.value: 如果我不同意评估员对我的财产的价值，我该怎么办？

data.name:
If you have any questions concerning the assessment of your property, contact the Assessor's Office to discuss your assessments and request an informal review. The Assessor's website contains contact information for office locations.

If you disagree with the Assessor's property assessment, you can appeal the assessed value with the Assessment Appeals Board. Contact the Assessment Appeals Board regarding the filing periods for regular, supplemental, or escape assessments. http://bos.lacounty.gov/Services/Assessment-Appeals.
data.value:
如果您对房产评估有任何疑问，请联系评估办公室讨论您的评估并要求进行非正式评估。评估员的网站包含办公地点的联系信息。

如果你如果不同意评估员的财产评估，您可以向评估上诉委员会提出评估价值。有关正常，补充或逃避评估的申请期，请联系评估上诉委员会。 http://bos.lacounty.gov/Services/Assessment-Appeals 。

data.name: What is Homeowner's Exemption (HOX)?
data.value: 什么是房主豁免（HOX）？

data.name:
If you own a home and occupy it as your residence on the tax lien date of January 1, you may apply for a Homeowners' Exemption. The exemption will reduce your assessed value by $7,000. On an average, you will save between $70.00 and $80.00 on your taxes.

If you are a new owner, you will automatically receive an exemption claim form in the mail. There is no cost to file. To receive 100 percent of the exemption ($7,000), you must file by February 15. If you file after February 15 but before December 10, you will receive 80 percent of the exemption ($5,600).

The exemption can be applied to your change of ownership supplemental if the prior owner of the property (seller) was not receiving the exemption.

For more information or to request a claim form, call the Assessor's Office at (213) 974-3211 or toll free at (888) 807-2111. You may also email the Assessor at helpdesk@assessor.lacounty.gov
data.value:
如果您在1月1日的纳税日期拥有房屋并将其作为您的住所，您可以申请房主免税。豁免将使您的评估价值减少7,000美元。平均而言，您的税款将节省70.00美元至80.00美元。

如果您是新的所有者，您将自动收到邮件中的豁免申请表。提交无需任何费用。要获得100％的免税（7,000美元），您必须在2月15日前提交。如果您在2月15日之后但在12月10日之前提交申请，您将获得80％的免税额（5,600美元）。

如果财产的前任所有人（卖方）未获得豁免，则可以对您的所有权变更进行豁免。

如需了解更多信息或索取索赔表，请致电评估办公室（ 213）974-3211或免费电话(888)807-2111。您也可以通过 helpdesk@assessor.lacounty.gov 向评估员发送电子邮件。

data.name: Is property tax relief available for senior citizen's? (Proposition 60 and 90)
data.value: 是否可以为老年人提供财产税减免？ （命题60和90）

data.name:
Proposition 60 and 90
(Senior Citizen s Replacement Dwelling Benefit)

Propositions 60 and 90 are constitutional initiatives passed by California voters. They provide property tax relief for persons age 55 and older by preventing reassessment when a senior citizen sells his/her existing residence and purchases or constructs a replacement residence worth the same or less than the original residence. This allows the senior citizen to continue to pay approximately the same amount of annual property taxes as before. The Assessor transfers the factored base value of the original residence to the replacement residence. For legal reference, see Section 69.5 of the Revenue & Taxation Code, available at http://www.boe.ca.gov/lawguides/property/current/ptlg/rt/69-5.html.

The replacement property and the original property, at the time of its sale, must have been eligible for the Homeowners' Exemption or entitled to the Disabled Veterans' Exemption. Besides being lesser in value, the replacement property must be purchased or newly constructed within two years, before or after the sale of the original property.

Proposition 60 is available when both the original and replacement properties are located within the same county such as Los Angeles County. Proposition 90 is available when the original and replacement properties are located in different counties. However, not all counties have passed an ordinance allowing Proposition 90. Currently, those counties accepting Proposition 90 are Alameda, San Diego, Santa Clara, Los Angeles, Orange, San Mateo and Ventura. This list is subject to change. Please check with the local county assessor before purchasing a replacement property.

A claim must be filed within three years of purchasing or completing new construction of the replacement property. If a claim is filed after the three year period, relief will be granted beginning with the calendar year in which the claim was filed. Proposition 60 or 90 can only be granted one time. For additional information, call the Assessor's Proposition Unit at (213) 893-1239. Claim forms are available at all of the Assessor's Offices and may be downloaded at the Assessor's website. Also, you may read more about Proposition 60 and 90 in the Assessor's brochure.
data.value:
命题60和90
（老年人的替代住房福利）

命题60和90是通过的宪法倡议加州选民。当老年人出售他/她的现有住所并购买或建造一个与原住所相同或更少的替代住宅时，他们通过防止重新评估为55岁及以上的人提供财产税减免。这使老年人可以继续支付与以前相同数额的年度财产税。评估员将原住所的因子基值转移到替代住所。有关法律参考，请参阅“税收和税收法典”第69.5节，可在 http://www.boe.ca.gov/lawguides/property/current/ptlg/rt/69-5.html 。

替换属性和原始财产在出售时，必须有资格获得房主豁免或有资格享受残疾退伍军人豁免。除了价值较小之外，更换物业必须在原物业出售之前或之后两年内购买或新建。

原始物业和替代物业都可以找到命题60在洛杉矶县等同一个县内。当原始属性和替换属性位于不同的县时，命题90可用。然而，并非所有县都通过了允许命题90的法令。目前，那些接受命题90的县是阿拉米达，圣地亚哥，圣克拉拉，洛杉矶，奥兰治，圣马特奥和文图拉。此列表可能会发生变化。在购买替代房产之前，请咨询当地的县评估员。

索赔必须在购买或完成替换房产的新建筑后三年内提出。 如果在三年期限之后提出索赔，将从提交索赔的日历年开始给予救济。命题60或90只能被授予一次。有关其他信息，请致电（213）893-1239与评估员的命题单位联系。索赔表格可在所有评估办公室索取，并可在评估员处下载网站。此外，您可以在评估员的小册子中阅读有关命题60和90的更多信息。

data.name: What requirements need to be met to qualify for temporary tax reduction as a result of damage to my property?
data.value: 由于我的财产受到损害，有资格获得临时减税的条件需要满足哪些要求？

data.name:
If your property has suffered damage of $10,000 or more as a result of a calamity, such as fire or flooding, you are eligible for a reduction in your property taxes. Your property will be immediately reappraised by the Assessor's Office and you will receive a corrected tax bill or refund. The adjustment and proration of taxes will be based upon the reduction in value from the date of damage to the end of the fiscal year in which the damage occurred, or until the structure is repaired or replaced.

Click here to download the Application for Reassessment of Property Damaged or Destroyed by Misfortune or Calamity. The application must be filed within 12 months of the occurrence of the damage.
data.value:
如果您的财产因火灾或洪水等灾难而遭受10,000美元或以上的损失，您有资格减免您的财产税。您的财产将立即由评估办公室重新评估，您将收到更正的税单或退款。税收的调整和分摊将基于从损坏发生之日起到损坏发生的财政年度结束时的价值减少，或直到修复或更换结构。

请点击此处下载重新评估遭遇不幸或灾难所致财产损失的申请。申请必须在损害发生后12个月内提交。

data.name: After my property is rebuilt or repaired, will my property taxes be increased?
data.value: 在我的财产重建或修复后，我的财产税会增加吗？

data.name: Yes, but only to the level they were before the damage occurred. This is true if the improvements are rebuilt in a like or similar manner, regardless of the actual cost of the rebuilding. You DO NOT lose your Proposition 13 benefits. However, if additional living space or other significant improvements are made in addition to the repair, additional taxes may result.
data.value: 是的，但仅限于损害发生前的水平。如果以类似或类似的方式重建改进，则无论重建的实际成本如何，都是如此。你不会失去命题13的好处。但是，如果除了维修之外还有额外的生活空间或其他重大改进，可能会产生额外的税收。

data.name: How do I find the owner of the property?
data.value: 我如何找到该物业的业主？

data.name: The Assessor's office does not provide owner name information on their website. However, you may visit one of the Assessor's offices and obtain this information. Please go to Office Locations for the addresses and telephone numbers of the Assessor's central and district public service counters. Alternatively, you may request owner information for a specific property by filling out a Public Inquiry Form or e-mailing the Assessor's Public Correspondence Unit at helpdesk@assessor.lacounty.gov. Be sure to provide the Assessor's Identification Number and/or complete address of the property you are inquiring.
data.value: 评估员办公室不在其网站上提供所有者姓名信息。但是，您可以访问评估员办公室之一并获取此信息。请到办公地点查看评估员中央和地区公共服务柜台的地址和电话号码。或者，您可以通过填写公共查询表或通过电子邮件发送评估员的公共通信单位 helpdesk@assessor.lacounty.gov 。请务必提供评估员的身份证号码和/或您要查询的物业的完整地址。

data.name: Can I get information on how to change title?
data.value: 我可以获得有关如何更改标题的信息吗？

data.name:
If you want to add or remove someone's name from the property tax records, you must record the appropriate document with the County Registrar-Recorder's Office in Norwalk. That office can be located at http://www.lavote.net. Concurrently, with the deeds being filed with the Recorder, you will also need to file the appropriate Change in Ownership Statement with the Assessor's Office. Change in Ownership Statements are available on the Assessor's website.

Before you record any document, you should speak with your tax advisor for information about any potential reassessment (tax increase) that may result from your recordation.
data.value:
如果要在财产税记录中添加或删除某人的姓名，您必须在Norwalk的County Registrar-Recorder办公室记录相应的文件。该办公室位于 http://www.lavote.net 。同时，通过向记录员提交契约，您还需要向评估员办公室提交相应的所有权变更声明。所有权声明的更改可在评估员网站上找到。
在您记录任何文件之前，您应该与您的税务顾问联系，以获取有关您的记录可能导致的任何潜在重新评估（增税）的信息。

data.name: Do you have information for new property owners?
data.value: 您是否有新业主的信息？

data.name:
What to expect:

Annual property tax bills are mailed every year in October to the owner of record as of January 1 of that year. If you do not receive the original bill by November 1, contact the County Tax Collector or Assessor for a duplicate bill. Note, the original bill may still have the prior owner's name on it the first year.

You should also expect to receive either one or two separate supplemental bills, which are in addition to your annual bill. These supplemental bills are for the difference in value between your new value and the seller's prior value. Supplemental bills are generally issued between three months to one year after you acquired the property. After you receive these supplemental bills, you can expect to receive only one bill a year thereafter. However, new supplemental bills will be created if there is another change in ownership or new construction event occurring on the property. Generally, supplemental taxes are not covered by impound accounts, and you are directly responsible for making payments.

Annual taxes are payable in two installments, the first is due November 1. It becomes delinquent if not paid by December 10. The second installment is due February 1, and becomes delinquent if not paid by April 10. Supplemental bills will have unique due dates as shown on the bill.

Locating tax amounts and payment status can be accessed throughout the year on the Tax Collector's website at https://ttc.lacounty.gov. You will need your Assessor's Identification Number (AIN) to use this feature.

If you purchased a home or condominium in a new development:

It is possible your property tax parcel number may not be created as of your purchase date or by the time the first annual taxes are due. If your property address is not yet on our records, you will need your legal description and Assessors Identification Number in order to properly index your situation with the County Assessor and County Tax Collector. You can locate this on your deed or title report. County Assessor staff should then be able to tell you when your first annual bill will be assessed and what to expect.
data.value:
期待什么：
每年10月，每年1月1日的年度物业税单被邮寄给记录所有者。如果您在11月1日之前未收到原始账单，请联系县税务员或评估员以获取重复账单。请注意，原始账单在第一年仍可能拥有其前所有者的姓名。

您还应该收到一个或两个单独的补充账单，这些账单是您年度账单的补充。这些补充账单用于表示新值与卖方先前价值之间的差额。补充账单一般在您获得财产后三个月至一年内发出。收到这些补充账单后，您每年只能收到一张账单。但是，如果房产的所有权或新建工程事件发生了其他变化，将会产生新的补充法案。一般来说，补充税不包括在扣押账户中，并且您直接负责支付。

年度税款分两期支付，第一期应于11月1日到期。如果未支付，则拖欠税款。 12月10日。第二期付款将于2月1日到期，如果未在4月10日之前支付，则拖欠会费。补充账单将在账单上显示独特的截止日期。

查找税额和付款状态可以是税务署署长的网站全年均可访问 https://ttc.lacounty.gov 。您将需要您的评估员识别码（AIN）才能使用此功能。

如果您在新开发项目中购买了房屋或公寓：

您的财产税包裹编号可能不会在您的购买日期或第一年度税款到期时创建。如果您的财产地址尚未出现在我们的记录中，您将需要您的法律描述和评估员识别号码，以便与县税务员和县税收员正确地指出您的情况。您可以在契约或职称报告中找到这个。然后，县评估员工作人员应该能够告诉您何时评估您的第一份年度账单以及期望什么。

data.name: I no longer own my business, why am I being billed?
data.value: 我不再拥有自己的生意，为什么要收到账单？

data.name:
Business personal property taxes are similar to vehicle registration fees. If you are the owner of the record as of January 1 (the lien date), you are responsible for the taxes for the entire year. Even if you sell, dispose, or remove the property after January 1, you are still legally responsible for the entire tax bill. We cannot prorate the tax bill. Any proration of the tax amount is strictly a private matter between buyer and seller.

If you sold, disposed or removed your personal property prior to January 1 and receive a tax bill, you should immediately contact the Assessor's Office. The regional office telephone number is printed on the tax bill in the Orange Box underneath the Assessed Values. If you do not have a bill, call the Assessor's Office at (213) 974-8613. You may also email the Assessor's Office at businesspp@assessor.lacounty.gov

Until the bill is cancelled on the Tax Collector's System by the Auditor/Controller, collection attempts will continue, including the filing of a tax lien.
data.value:
商业个人财产税与车辆登记费相似。如果您是1月1日（留置权日期）的记录所有者，则您需要负责全年的税费。即使您在1月1日之后出售，处置或移除财产，您仍然对整个税单负有法律责任。我们不能按比例分摊税款。任何税额的分配都是买卖双方之间的私事。

如果您在1月1日之前出售，处置或移走您的个人财产并收到税单，您应立即联系评估员办公室。区域办事处的电话号码印在评估价值下方橙色框的税单上。如果您没有账单，请致电（213）974-8613与评估办公室联系。您也可以通过 businesspp@assessor.lacounty.gov 向评估办公室发送电子邮件

在审计员/财务主任取消税务员收集系统之前，收款尝试将继续进行，包括提交税务留置权。

data.name: What do I do to obtain a Mobile Home Tax Clearance Certificate?
data.value: 如何获得移动房屋税务清关证书？

data.name:
To obtain a Certificate of Tax Clearance on your mobile home, you must submit a written request. You may fax your request to (213) 633-5004 or mail to 225 North Hill Street, Room 160, Los Angeles, California 90054-0970.

Please include address and mobile home location, decal number, current registered owner, serial number, name of buyer, mailing address and daytime telephone number.
data.value:
要获得移动房屋的清关证明，您必须提交书面申请。您可以将您的请求传真至(213)633-5004或邮寄至225 North Hill Street，Room 160，Los Angeles，California 90054-0970。

请包括地址和移动房屋位置，贴花编号，当前注册所有者，序列号，买家姓名，邮寄地址和日间电话号码。

data.name: How can I change my mailing address?
data.value: 如何更改我的邮寄地址？

data.name:
Mailing address changes for property owned by and held in the name of an individual or individuals can be submitted by filling out a Change of Mailing Address Form. The form must be printed, signed and mailed to the Assessor's Office at 500 W. Temple St. Room 301 Los Angeles, CA 90012-2770.

Additional documentation is required to change the mailing address for property held in a trust, in the estate of a deceased, or owned by a LLC, Corporation, or Partnership. Please click here for a check list of required documents.

If you wish to speak directly with the Assessor's public service staff, please see Office Locations for the addresses and telephone numbers of their central and district public service counters.
data.value:
可以通过填写邮寄地址表格的变更。表格必须打印，签名并邮寄至500 W. Temple St. Room 301 Los Angeles，CA 90012-2770的评估办公室。

需要更多文件来更改所持物业的邮寄地址在信托中，在死者遗产中，或由LLC，公司或合伙企业拥有。请点击此处查看所需文件的核对清单。

如果您希望直接与评估员的公共服务人员交谈，请参阅办公地点了解地址他们的中央和地区公共服务柜台的电话号码。

data.name: Are there any Installment Plans?
data.value: 有没有分期付款计划？

data.name: Yes, information about Installment Plans is available at: https://ttc.lacounty.gov/property-tax-installment-plans/
data.value: 是的，有关分期付款计划的信息，请访问： https://ttc.lacounty.gov/物业税分期-计划/

data.name: How do I contact the Tax Agent Registration for further information?
data.value: 如何获取税务代理注册以获取更多信息？

data.name: You may contact the Tax Agent Registration Division via email at TaxAgentRegistration@bos.lacounty.gov or visit the website at http://bos.lacounty.gov/Services/Assessment-Appeals/Tax-Agent-Registration.
data.value: 您可以通过电子邮件联系税务代理注册部门，电子邮件地址为 TaxAgentRegistration@bos.lacounty.gov ，或访问网站http://bos.lacounty.gov/Services/Assessment-Appeals/Tax-Agent-Registration.

data.name: What is the registration fee?
data.value: 什么是注册费？

data.name:
The annual registration fee of $250 must be paid each fiscal year (beginning July 1st).

A credit card is required to pay the registration fee online. Acceptable forms of payment include Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover.
data.value:
每个财政年度（从7月1日开始）必须支付250美元的年度注册费。

信用卡需要在线支付注册费。可接受的付款方式包括Visa，MasterCard，American Express和Discover。

data.name: What is the difference between an Agent’s Authorization and Tax Agent Registration?
data.value: 代理商的授权和税务代理注册之间有什么区别？

data.name:
An Agent’s Authorization is used by taxpayers to authorize an individual or an agency to represent them in tax matters before the Assessment Appeals Board, Office of the Assessor, Auditor-Controller and/or Treasurer and Tax Collector. The Agent’s Authorization is essentially used for individuals or agencies that may not have an attorney representing the case (as attorneys are on retainer).

The Agent’s Authorization is for specific properties and must be signed by the property owner or authorized principal or officer. The Tax Agent Registration is required for anyone who falls into the definition of a Tax Agent. Tax Agents may be attorneys, certified public accountants, company employees, or any other person authorized to represent a taxpayer in property tax matters. The Tax Agent Registration process registers the individuals in Los Angeles County and provides a channel for them to report campaign contributions on a semi-annual basis. A Tax Agent would still need to have an Agent’s Authorization to represent specific properties (with the exception of attorneys).
data.value:
纳税人使用代理人的授权来授权个人或代理机构在评估上诉委员会，评估办公室，审计员 - 财务主管和/或财务主管和税务收集者的税务事宜中代表他们。代理人的授权主要用于可能没有律师代表案件的个人或代理机构（因为律师是保留人）。

代理商的授权适用于特定的财产，必须由业主或授权的主管或官员签署。任何属于税务代理定义的人都需要注册税务代理。税务代理人可以是律师，注册会计师，公司员工，或任何其他有权代表纳税人处理财产税事宜的人。税务代理注册流程在洛杉矶县注册个人，并为他们提供半年度报告活动贡献的渠道。税务代理仍然需要代理人的授权来代表特定的财产（律师除外）。

data.name: If there are employees such as paralegals and/or assistants who obtain information on behalf of the agents or attorneys, do they need to register also?
data.value: 如果有律师助理和/或助理等员工代表代理人或律师获取信息，他们是否也需要注册？

data.name: No, but upon contacting a County official, the paralegals or assistants (or other clerical staff) would need to identify the Agent or Attorney on whose behalf they are working, and that Agent or Attorney must be registered as a Tax Agent.
data.value: 不，但在与县官员联系时，律师助理或助理（或其他文书工作人员）需要确定代表他们工作的代理人或律师，并且代理人或律师必须注册为税务代理人。

data.name: Who is a Tax Agent?
data.value: 谁是税务代理？

data.name: A Tax Agent is defined as any person who is employed, is under contract, or otherwise receives compensation to communicate directly, or through agents, employees or subcontractors, with any county official with the Assessor, Assessment Appeals Board, Assessment Hearing Officers, Auditor -Controller or Treasurer and Tax Collector for the purpose of influencing official action.
data.value: 税务代理被定义为受雇，合同或其他方面的任何人 获得补偿，直接沟通，或通过代理，员工或 分包商，任何县官员与评估员，评估上诉委员会， 评估听证官，审计员 - 控制器或财务主管和税务员 影响官方行动的目的。

data.name: What is influencing official action / official action?
data.value: 什么影响官方行动/官方行动？

data.name:
Influencing official action means representing a taxpayer as an agent in connection with any matter before any County official, by promoting, supporting, Influencing, seeking modification of, opposing or seeking delay of any official action by any means.

Official action means locating all taxable property in the County; identifying ownership; establishing a taxable value for all property subject to property taxation, including the initial value, declines in value, corrections to values and any other changes in the taxable value set; completing an assessment roll showing the assessed values of all property; applying all legal exemptions to assessments; issuing refunds; and deciding all property assessment disputes between taxpayers and a County official.

Not all interactions or communications will begin as influencing official action. At the point at which one communicates or knows they will communicate with a County Official in order to influence the determination of value, they would need to register as a Tax Agent.
data.value:
影响官方行动是指通过任何方式促进，支持，影响，寻求修改，反对或寻求延迟任何官方行动，代表纳税人作为任何县官员面前的任何事务的代理人。

官方行动意味着查找县内的所有应税财产;确定所有权;为所有受财产征税影响的财产确定应税价值，包括初始价值，价值下降，价值更正和应税价值集的任何其他变化;填写评估卷，显示所有财产的评估值;将所有法律豁免适用于评估;发放退款;并决定纳税人与县官员之间的所有财产评估纠纷。

并非所有的互动或沟通都会影响官方行动。在传达或知道他们将与县官员沟通以影响价值决定的时刻，他们需要注册为税务代理。

data.name: Who is not considered a Tax Agent?
data.value: 谁不被视为税务代理？

data.name:
A. Tax Agent does not include:

      A. An elected or appointed public official or public employee when acting in his or her official capacity; or

      B. A person representing the following:

            1. Himself or Herself

            2. An immediate family member; or

             3. An entity of which the person is a partner, officer, or owner of 10 percent or more of the value of the entity.
data.value:
A.税务代理不包括：

      ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP;＆NBSP; A。以其官方身份行事的当选或任命的公职人员或公职人员;或

      ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP;＆NBSP;乙。代表以下人士：

          ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP;＆NBSP;＆NBSP; ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP;＆NBSP; 1。他自己或她自己

          ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP;＆NBSP;＆NBSP; ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP;＆NBSP; 2。直系亲属;或

         ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP;＆NBSP;＆NBSP; ＆NBSP; ＆NBSP;＆NBSP; 3.该人是该实体价值的10％或以上的合伙人，高级职员或所有者的实体。

data.name: How can I obtain information on Multiple Parcels?
data.value: 如何获取有关多个包裹的信息？

data.name: Information about Multiple Parcels can be obtained at: https://ttc.lacounty.gov/secured-property-tax-information-request-multiple-parcels
data.value: 有关多个地块的信息，请访问： https：// ttc .lacounty.gov /固定-财产税信息请求-多包裹
